<h1><p align="center">Instructions how to configure local environment</p></h1>
<p></p>
<h3><p align="center">To configure local environment on your PC you should pass few steps.</h3></p><br>
<h3><p align="center">To get source code:</p></h3><br>
<ol>
<li>Downlaod TortoiseSVN(from http://sourceforge.net/projects/tortoisesvn/)</li>
<li>Install it in PC</li>
<li>Create folder in local hard disk</li>
<li>Right click mouse on created folder and choose SVN Checkout...</li>
<li>In dialog window paste URL https://taksopark.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ and click "OK" button</li>
<li>Wait few seconds for successful updating project from code.google.com</li>
</ol>
